title.rendered: … Until I walked through the CGB Gates!!

content.rendered:
The words of the Perrott Family for CGB:

Mr. Tomalin – Robert:

I have been a nurse and a police officer all my life, working hard, with commitment and good values but…

I’ve read many times about companies such as Google and Apple, where they talk about providing such an environment, that it nurtures and allows people to be inspirational, to be the best the can be. I have never really understood this and had never experienced such a place – Until I walked through the CGB gates!!

Every single time I walked through your doors it brought tears to my eyes to watch the children, and every member of staff, it was incredible. I can’t find the words, it’s more of a feeling. Feeling so happy and privileged that my boys get to experience this every day.

I hope both Archie and Buster have “sucked up” enough CGB to carry them forward and form the wonderful humans I hope for them to be.

Thank you for showing my family what learning and growing is all about.

“No llores porque se acabó, sonríe porque sucedió”

Our love and thanks forever.

Francesca.
